mapper.select: /*AsideMapper.liveComments*/ SELECT A.DM_CD AS "DM_CD" , SUBSTRING(F_NVL_TEXT(B.COMP_NM, F_NVL_TEXT(B.DM_CONTENTS, '내용없음')), 1, 12) AS "COMP_NM" , SUBSTRING(A.CONTENTS, 1, 12) AS "COMMENT" , B.DM_TYPE AS "DM_TYPE" , SUBSTRING(F_ES_CODE_DETAIL(#{COMPANY_CD}, 'ES_Q0139', B.DM_TYPE), 1, 2) AS "DM_TYPE_NM" , TO_CHAR(SUBSTRING(a.INSERT_DATE, 1, 8)::DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "DTS" FROM PL_DM_COMM A INNER JOIN PL_DM_M B ON A.DM_CD = B.DM_CD ORDER BY A.WRITE_DATE DESC LIMIT 10

/*AsideMapper.liveRanks*/ WITH TODAY_DATA AS ( -- 오늘 ~ 7 일 전 가장 인기많은 쉑 SELECT COUNT(A.DM_CD) AS DM_COUNT , B.DM_CD , SUBSTRING(F_NVL_TEXT(B.COMP_NM, F_NVL_TEXT(B.DM_CONTENTS, '내용없음')), 1, 12) AS COMP_NM , B.DM_TYPE , B.WRITE_DATE , RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(A.DM_CD) DESC) AS TODAY_RANK FROM PL_DM_COMM A INNER JOIN PL_DM_M B ON A.DM_CD = B.DM_CD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SYSDEF_CD FROM ES_CODEDTL WHERE FIELD_CD = 'ES_Q0141' AND FLAG1_CD = 'Y' LIMIT 1 ) D ON 1 = 1 WHERE CURRENT_DATE - TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(REPLACE(B.WRITE_DATE, '-', ''), 1, 8), 'YYYYMMDD') < COALESCE(D.SYSDEF_CD::INTEGER, 7) GROUP BY B.DM_CD, B.COMP_NM, B.DM_CONTENTS, B.DM_TYPE, B.WRITE_DATE ), YESTERDAY_DATA AS ( -- 일주일 전 ~ 14 일 전 가장 인기많은 쉑 SELECT COUNT(A.DM_CD) AS DM_COUNT , B.DM_CD , RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(A.DM_CD) DESC) AS YESTERDAY_RANK FROM PL_DM_COMM A INNER JOIN PL_DM_M B ON A.DM_CD = B.DM_CD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SYSDEF_CD FROM ES_CODEDTL WHERE FIELD_CD = 'ES_Q0141' AND FLAG1_CD = 'Y' LIMIT 1 ) D ON 1 = 1 WHERE (CURRENT_DATE - 7) - TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(REPLACE(B.WRITE_DATE, '-', ''), 1, 8), 'YYYYMMDD') < COALESCE(D.SYSDEF_CD::INTEGER + 7, 14) GROUP BY B.DM_CD ) SELECT T.DM_CD AS "DM_CD" , T.DM_COUNT AS "DM_COUNT" , T.COMP_NM AS "COMP_NM" , T.DM_TYPE AS "DM_TYPE" , T.WRITE_DATE AS "WRITE_DATE" , T.TODAY_RANK AS "TODAY_RANK" , Y.YESTERDAY_RANK AS "YESTERDAY_RANK" , (Y.YESTERDAY_RANK - T.TODAY_RANK) AS "RANK_DIFF" -- +면 상승, -면 하락 FROM TODAY_DATA T LEFT JOIN YESTERDAY_DATA Y ON T.DM_CD = Y.DM_CD ORDER BY T.TODAY_RANK, T.WRITE_DATE DESC LIMIT 5

/*AsideMapper.commonHeader*/ SELECT A.FIELD_CD as "FIELD_CD" , A.SYSDEF_CD as "SYSDEF_CD" , A.COMPANY_CD as "COMPANY_CD" , A.SYSCODE_FG1 as "SYSCODE_FG1" , A.USRDEF_CD as "USRDEF_CD" , A.USRDEF_NM as "USRDEF_NM" , A.SYSDEF_NM as "SYSDEF_NM" , A.USE_YN as "USE_YN" , A.FLAG1_CD as "FLAG1_CD" , A.FLAG2_CD as "FLAG2_CD" , A.FLAG3_CD as "FLAG3_CD" , A.SYSDEF_E_NM as "SYSDEF_E_NM" , A.FLAG4_CD as "FLAG4_CD" FROM ES_CODEDTL A WHERE A.COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} AND A.FIELD_CD = 'ES_Q0145' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.FLAG4_CD

/*AsideMapper.commonLink*/ SELECT CONCAT('http://117.52.84.88:8080', FILE_PATH, '/', FILE_NAME, '.', FILE_EXT) AS "IMG_URL" , TABLE_ID AS "TABLE_ID" , LINK AS "LINK" FROM ES_FILE WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} AND TABLE_ID IN ('PATH_BANNER_PC', 'PATH_BANNER_MO')
